name: Aime (Demo)
description:
Demo for my game first ever game, Aime. Help a girl get out of her own house and even discover a few hidden secrets on the way. Takes 5-10 minutes to complete. Updates will happen but will take time since I have other things in my life to do and I can't put all my concentration into this game.

Please consider supporting me by giving me even a dollar or supporting me on patreon! 

You can even follow my Twitter!

UPDATE 3/20/2019

If the game isnt working you might need to install RTP for RPG Maker XP, which can be found here! (Thank you nalurose!): http://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages
